chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 has the above problem:
When will my phone be shipped? I need it urgently or else I'll have to cancel.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We're getting ready to ship the parcel and want to ensure everything's perfect. Can we quickly re-confirm the customer's address?

Your satisfaction is our priority, and this small step helps us guarantee a seamless delivery experience. Just a moment of your time could prevent any delivery issues.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile,

please cancel the order and return the customer's money thank you


Regards,
Hamza from the Back Care Team

Hello Claudia, You can find your return label in this message attachment. Your return will be processed by Chronopost. Just drop off your package at a nearby return location. A list of locations can be found here: To prepare for your return: 1. Follow the instructions on how to return an item here 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product 3. Remove any existing protective cover or film 4. Wrap your product and its accessories according to the tips below. How to wrap your product: • The box should be strong and sturdy, with your product lying flat inside so it doesn't move during transit. • Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a replacement label inside if the original one is lost or damaged). • Take photos of the package from both inside and outside before sending it. This protects you in case your product gets damaged during transit. Your return is now ready to be dropped off! We'll let you know when it arrives at our facility. Best regards, Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare, please relay the following message to the customer. 
 
We are so sorry that you are unhappy with our product, as your product is still in transit, our logistics partner has suggested you to do the following.

1. Refuse the parcel when a delivery attempt is made.
2. If unable to refuse a parcel, do not open the product packaging. Use the return label provided by BackMarket and send the device back immediately.

By doing the following, you would be sure to receive a much FASTER REFUND for this order. 

Thank you.
Regards, 
JY

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

We await the arrival of the device.

Regards,
TB

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their refund.

We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Please proceed with the refund within 24h, otherwise we will do it. 

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Diogo Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded  the customer for deadline passed


Kind regards, Ricardo-Filipe from Back Market
